--- title: "Publishing Quarto" format: revealjs: transition: fade background-transition: fade theme: ../style.scss footer: filters: - reveal-auto-agenda --- ## Publishing options Quarto documents are typically just static HTML pages so can be deployed to any web server or web host. - [Posit Connect Cloud](https://connect.posit.cloud/) - [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/) - [Quarto Pub](https://quartopub.com/) - [Posit Connect](https://posit.co/products/enterprise/connect/) ::: aside [Publishing Quarto documentation](https://quarto.org/docs/publishing/) ::: ## Posit Connect Cloud ![](../images/pcc.png){fig-align="center"} [https://connect.posit.cloud/](https://connect.posit.cloud/) Easily publish and share data applications and documents in a cloud environment within minutes. ## Your turn {background-color='{{< brand color pink >}}'} If you have a GitHub account and have cloned the workshop repo, sign up for a free Posit Connect Cloud account: * Click the blue "Publish" button. * Select "Quarto". * Select your workshop repository. * Select `publish-dashboard` as the branch. * Click "Publish". ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
05:00
``` ::: ::: ## Wrap Up {background-image="../images/quarto-chat.jpg" background-color="#2b3d5b"} ## Time for Q&A! {.center} ## Learning more | | | |-------------------------|-----------------------------------------------| | About Quarto | | | Quarto Automation | | | Quarto Dashboards | | | Quarto Websites | | ## Thank you! {.center}
